mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id, category, subject, title, content, writing_open) values (#{userId}, #{category}, #{subject}, #{title},#{content},#{writingOpen})
mapper.update: update board set category=#{category}, subject=subject, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writing_open=#{writingOpen} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from board order by bno desc;
mapper.update: update board set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from board order by bno desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from board order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

sql.if: where title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')

mapper.update: update board set reply_cnt= replyCnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
